name: Deep Action
description:
An unknown alien object has crashed in the middle of the ocean. You have been sent by the government to "investigate" it with an Action Sub.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Theme: Roll of the dice

Controls:

"WASD" to move

"SPACE" to use something random

Headphones reccomended!

Full controller support!

Music and art are made by myself during the 48 hour period.
